titles.title: Observing the 29th anniversary of the 1994 genocide against the Tutsi in Rwanda.
Observing the 29th anniversary of the 1994 genocide against the Tutsi in Rwanda.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution observes the 29th anniversary of the 1994 genocide against the Tutsi in Rwanda, remembering the victims and survivors. It also recognizes the ongoing efforts of Rwanda to promote peace, reconciliation, and development, as well as reaffirms a commitment to prevent genocide and other mass atrocities.
